document_data.name: Gundar Brontoskin
document_data.mainbody: '''Gundar Brontoskin''' was the King of [[Grunwald]] and the [[Thunderbeast Tribe]].
document_data.Description: The king was a good looking man who ruled Grunwald with a light touch.
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Gundar used a [[broadsword]], a [[handaxe]], and carried hidden [[dagger]]s on his person.
document_data.Personality: Brontoskin was very diplomatic with the [[Uthgardt]] barbarians and kept them from raiding many nearby settlements. He was deeply interested in any news from around [[Faer√ªn]]. He was said to have won the loyalty and respect of [[Red Tiger tribe]] for having slain a [[leucrotta]] with only a pair of [[red tiger]] claws during a [[Runemeet]].
